About the Project

4-bit counter implementation on Zybo FPGA Board

Skills

  • FPGA Design
  • Veriog System
  • LED Interfacing
  • Counter Design

Project Description

  • Verilog Coding:Developed Verilog code for 4-bit counter implementation utilizing the time division module.
  • FPGA Zybo Z710:Implemented the designed verilog code on the FPGA Zybo z710 board,showcasinng practicalapplication of theoretical concepts
  • Utilized LEDs:Utilized LEDs as visual indicators,effectively representing the sequential state changes from 0000 to 1111
  • RTL Schematic:Conducted a comprehensive study of the RTL Schematic and Synthesis Schematic ,gaining insights into the underlying hardware architecture and the synthesis process.
  • Digital Circuit Design:The project not only demonstrates the proficiency in FPGA programming but also involves a thorough understanding of digital circuit design and synthesis methodologies
